alert.note: Alert for Ocean; Southeastern Burlington (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 2:25PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Ocean and east central Burlington Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 224 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bamber Lake, or 11 miles southwest of Toms River, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Beachwood, Lakehurst, Holiday City-Berkeley, Bamber Lake, Cedar Glen Lakes, Whiting, Brookville, Holiday City South, Warren Grove, Pine Ridge At Crestwood, Old Halfway, South Toms River, Crestwood Village, Holiday City and Holiday Heights. This includes Garden State Parkway between mile markers 74 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
